name: The missing note - playjam#1 Playdate - Pulp
name_original: The missing note - playjam#1 Playdate - Pulp
description:
Here my submission for the first PlayJam : "Something is missing".

There is somebug that stop the game on the sdk simulator and surely on the playdate.
Load the json on pulp and play on the web! Open well your ear !


It's a very basic ear guessing game where you must find the note that is not in the melody.
It's a highscore softwar music gamefiest where you must find the missing note of the melody.
There is an highscore system to try to get better by beat yourself!
There is also a jam room to try to play music with the system of "the missing note" by the crank.

There is somebug that stop the game on the sdk simulator and surely on the playdate.

That make me sharing my saving room code and highscore !


I'll try in futur to debug it (and maybe complete it)
It was a cool first jam for my own and edition of playjam !

I love to make it throw the playdate console just for trying my crank system on perfection it ===> maybe somekind of pulpsynth...
I also need to checking more on sdk lua coding after my other pulp project.

Stay alert for futur project for playdate from me :)
